code: var animateRef=[];export var observer=new IntersectionObserver(function(entries){entries.forEach(function(entry){if(entry.isIntersecting){entry.target.classList.add("show");}else{entry.target.classList.remove("show");}});});export var addToRef=function addToRef(el){if(el&&!animateRef.includes(el)){animateRef.push(el);}};export var animateCurrentElements=function animateCurrentElements(){animateRef.forEach(function(el){return observer.observe(el);});animateRef=[];};
